sentences.sContent: She traded in her old refrigerator for a new one.
sentences.sContent_eng: She traded in her old refrigerator for a new one.
sentences.sCn: 她以旧冰箱折价添钱买了一台新冰箱。

sentences.sContent: Take the beef out of the refrigerator to defrost.
sentences.sContent_eng: Take the beef out of the refrigerator to defrost.
sentences.sCn: 把牛肉从冰箱里拿出来解冻。

sentences.sContent: My refrigerator suddenly started kicking up yesterday.
sentences.sContent_eng: My refrigerator suddenly started kicking up yesterday.
sentences.sCn: 我的冰箱昨晚突然出了故障。

phrases.pCn: 吸收式冷冻机；吸收式冰箱

words.tran: 冷藏（refrigerate的过去分词）；使冷却
冷藏，冷冻；使冷却；使清凉

remMethod.val: re(一再) ＋ frig(冷) ＋ era ＋ or(表物) → 冰箱

trans.tranOther: a large piece of electrical kitchen equipment, shaped like a cupboard, used for keeping food and drink cool
